articles.author: Rajesh Pandey
articles.title: Here's when your Samsung Galaxy phone gets One UI 6 - Android Police
articles.description: Samsung wants to update all its devices to Android 14 before the end of 2023, at least in Europe
articles.content:
Summary
  • Samsung has started rolling out the One UI 6 update for the Galaxy S23 series, with availability expanding gradually to other regions.
